p: In the city Nouméa, a total of 2,310 dengue cases were reported during the 2008–2009 epidemic (incidence rate: 23.7 cases per 1000 P-Y, 95% confidence interval (CI): 22.7–24.6). In Nouméa, the incidence rate was higher in 2012–2013 with 3,369 reported cases (34.5 cases/1000 P-Y, 95% CI: 33.4–35.7) ( Table 2).
